mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation (member_id, vehicle_number, reservation_start, reservation_end, status, fee) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{vehicleNumber}, #{reservationStart}, #{reservationEnd}, #{status}, #{fee})
mapper.update: UPDATE reservation SET status = #{status} WHERE reservation_id = #{reservationId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reservation WHERE status = 'PAID' AND reservation_start <= NOW() AND reservation_end >= NOW()

SELECT reservation_id AS reservationId, member_id AS memberId, vehicle_number AS vehicleNumber, reservation_start AS reservationStart, reservation_end AS reservationEnd, status, fee FROM reservation WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND status = 'PAID' AND reservation_end >= NOW() ORDER BY reservation_start ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM subscription WHERE active = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE reservation SET status = 'CANCELLED', cancel_reason = #{cancelReason}, cancelled_at = NOW(), refund_amount = #{refundAmount}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE reservation_id = #{reservationId}
